name: ionic-native
description: Native plugin wrappers for Cordova and Ionic with TypeScript, ES6+, Promise and Observable support

1.0.7.name: ionic-native
1.0.7.description: Native plugins for Cordova and Ionic with ES6+, Promise and Observable support

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc

1.0.8.name: ionic-native
1.0.8.description: Native plugins for Cordova and Ionic with ES6+, Promise and Observable support

scripts.build: tsc --module commonjs --sourcemap --outDir dist/ --experimentalDecorators -d node_modules/@reactivex/rxjs/typings/es6-shim/es6-shim.d.ts src/index.ts --target ES5
scripts.build_bundle: npm run-script build && browserify dist/index.js > dist/ionic.native.js

1.0.9.name: ionic-native

scripts.build: tsc --module commonjs --sourcemap --outDir dist/ --experimentalDecorators -d typings/es6-shim/es6-shim.d.ts src/index.ts --target ES5
scripts.build_bundle: npm run-script build && browserify dist/index.js > dist/ionic.native.js
